Class PendingUserDAO

java.lang.Object
app.tracktune.model.user.PendingUserDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
DAO<PendingUser>
public class PendingUserDAO extends Object implements DAO<PendingUser>
Data Access Object for the PendingUser entity. Provides CRUD operations and specific queries to interact with the PendingUsers table.
